keyword: calories in banana bread from starbucks
title: Calories in Starbucks Banana Bread
meta_description: Discover calories in banana bread from Starbucks, including full nutrition breakdown per slice, macros, and preparation tweaks for your coffee shop treat.
assumptions: Standard Starbucks banana nut loaf slice (~113 g), baked with bananas, walnuts, and sugar; values from official menu data.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, batch, and customizations; check Starbucks app or labels for latest info.

quick_answer.text: One slice of Starbucks banana bread has 410 kcal, with 58 g carbs and 5 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in banana bread from Starbucks?
What are the carbs in Starbucks banana bread?
faqs.a: About 58 g total carbs, including 32 g sugars and 2 g fiber per slice.

faqs.q: Is Starbucks banana bread high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, 18 g total fat per slice, with 3.5 g saturated.

faqs.q: How much protein in a slice of Starbucks banana bread?
Does Starbucks banana bread have nuts?
faqs.a: Yes, it includes walnuts; ask for nut-free if allergic, but availability varies.
